author: bvahdat
msg: Fixed the test failure with NPE on the CI-Server. The usage of static variables was the cause of this in case the second test method would be run as the first one in which case both beforeThreadName & afterThreadName would be null. Also afterThreadName should be correctly volatile as we set it's value async but read it inside the main thread.
